name: fneq1i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, c2), wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)

comment: Equality inference for function predicate with domain. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 22-Jun-2011.)
